GSD.product_version: versions from v4.10 to before v5.10.138
GSD.description:
drm/meson: Fix refcount bugs in meson_vpu_has_available_connectors()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.138 by commit 3aa710e96747c8b4e52ba12ffe09edcb2755897c, it was introduced in version v4.10 by commit bbbe775ec5b5dace43a35886da9924837da09ddd. For more details please see the references link.
